programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A superstar attorney impersonates an executive to bilk hedge funds out of millions.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Arthur Nadel conjures up a huge hedge fund. Then he disappears and leaves clients without their life savings. Get the inside story on a multi-million-dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Nicholas Cosmo: All Interest, No Return
programme.desc: Nicholas Cosmo pleads guilty to federal mail fraud and wire fraud in 2009 for his involvement in a Ponzi scheme that resulted in losses of more than $195 million.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A Florida man wins millions in the lottery then disappears.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Rapper$ Delight; The Grapes of Greed
programme.desc: A former bank robber makes millions by promoting musicians; a man's fake fine wine storage business.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Detroit Mayor Kwame Kilpatrick and his associates extort city contractors, abuse public funds, and turn the mayor's office into their own cash machine, costing the city millions.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Inside Trading Trio; Cocaine Cash Cleaner
programme.desc: Three friends go to New York to realize their dreams, which quickly turns criminal; a series of brutal murders lead to a Miami man with a suburban life.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: An independent film spins out of control when a filmmaker's silent partner and spiritual guru helps himself to investor funds.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: The story of Wall Street wiz, Stephen Trantel, a one time successful commodities broker who turns to bank robbing to support his greedy lifestyle.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: An "asset protection" guru steals millions from the famous, elderly and sick; he makes money disappear in a Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A superstar attorney impersonates an executive to bilk hedge funds out of millions.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Arthur Nadel conjures up a huge hedge fund. Then he disappears and leaves clients without their life savings. Get the inside story on a multi-million-dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: Lockup: Savannah: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Five miles from the riverfront hotels and restaurants of Savannah, Georgia, is a more ominous site, a place where an inmate is severely injured and a friendship is torn; two soon to be brothers-in-law are accused of double homicide.

programme.title: Lockup: Savannah: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A planned romantic weekend turns into a nightmare for one young couple; a fight sends two women to segregation, and for one of the combatants, the isolation takes its toll.

programme.title: Lockup: Savannah: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One man prepares for life behind bars after running someone down with his car; another man must be placed in isolation for his own protection, after being accused of knowingly giving women HIV.

programme.title: Lockup: Savannah: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The Chatham County Detention Center hosts an inmate who faces a life sentence for murdering his spouse; another inmate's illegal business stands in the way of him graduating from the jail's strict substance abuse program.

programme.title: Lockup: Savannah: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One inmate is tested when he returns to general population after spending months in the segregation unit; another inmate vows to do damage because he feels like an outcast.

programme.title: Lockup: Savannah: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A jail program attempts to save shelter dogs from being put down; an Army veteran must face his own demons; pregnant and charged with murder, one inmate must decide whether to turn in a family member to save herself.

programme.title: Lockup: Cincinnati: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A jailhouse assault leads to one bloody inmate, and two sides to the story; another inmate makes a daring escape; one of the jail's most violent inmates decides it's time for a change.

programme.title: Lockup: Cincinnati: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An online post from a diehard Dodgers fan leads to his arrest at a Reds game; a tragic shooting leaves one inmate facing prison time and outrage over his punishment leads to more arrests.

programme.title: Lockup: Cincinnati: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A heroin addict must choose between the lifestyle she craves and the young son she has left behind; another seasoned female inmate is transferred back to the jail from state prison, but she suddenly finds herself on the wrong end of a fist.
